articles.title: Vietnam to postpone SEA Games until next year: Report - CNA
articles.description: HANOI: Vietnam plans to postpone this year's Southeast Asian Games, state media said on Wednesday (Jun 9), as the country grapples with a new virus outbreak.
articles.content:
HANOI: Vietnam plans to postpone this year's Southeast Asian Games, state media said on Wednesday (Jun 9), as the country grapples with a new virus outbreak.

articles.title: Alibaba to build first data center in Philippines by end of 2021 - Rappler
articles.description: The Philippines will become the 4th country in Southeast Asia to have a local Alibaba Cloud data center, following Singapore, Malaysia, and Indonesia
articles.content: Cloud computing has become central to the digitalization of businesses in the Philippines and around Asia. With our first data center in the country, we will be able to better support Philippine ente… [+177 chars]
